env.name: USERNAME
env.label: Username
env.description: The username of the user using this instance

env.name: PROJECTPATH
env.label: Project path
env.description: The path to the root of the project, starting from the user's home directory.

env.name: PROJECT
env.label: The name of the project
env.description: The name of the project that will be used to create the Traefik endpoints. Must be URL safe.
